text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <ADVERTISMENT>
        <TEXT>In denen Thurneysischen Buchlden allhier werden die ersten zwey Theile von folgendem Werck denen Herren Subseribenten ausgelffert:</TEXT>
        <BIBLIOGRAPHY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>Roberti Stephani</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Thesaurus Linguae Latinae post noviss. Londin. edit. insignitor auctam Annokationibus Honrici Stephani Locupletatus</TITLE>
                <EDITOR>Ant. Birrius</EDITOR>
                <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <TITLE>T. Lilius e. Integr. Sigonii & Gronovior Norit</TITLE>
                <VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME>
                <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT>
                <PAPER_TYPE>Schreib-Median-Pappier</PAPER_TYPE>
                <PRICE>
                    <AMOUNT>fl. 6.</AMOUNT>
                    <DURATION>kbanfftige Wochen</DURATION>
                </PRICE>
                <VALIDITY>
                    <DURATION>nur bis Ende Januarii</DURATION>
                    <YEAR>1740</YEAR>
                </VALIDITY>
                <PRICE_NOTE>nach welcher Zeit kein Eremplar unter <PRICE>7fl. 30. xr.</PRICE> verkaufft werden solle.</PRICE_NOTE>
            </ENTRY>
        </BIBLIOGRAPHY>
    </ADVERTISMENT>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"1. Added XML declaration at the beginning.
2. Wrapped the content in a logical structure with <ADVERTISMENT> and <TEXT> tags for the introductory text.
3. Created a <BIBLIOGRAPHY> section to group bibliographic entries.
4. Split the original <BIBL> tag into multiple <ENTRY> tags for each bibliographic item.
5. Separated the second author into an <EDITOR> tag.
6. Added <PAPER_TYPE> tag for the paper description.
7. Structured the price information into a <PRICE> section with <AMOUNT> and <DURATION> tags.
8. Created a <VALIDITY> section to encapsulate the time-related information.
9. Added a <PRICE_NOTE> tag for the note about the price after the validity period.
10. Fixed and normalized special characters (e.g., , ffert, banfftige).
11. Ensured proper nesting and hierarchy of tags.
12. Added missing closing tags for all opened tags."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <ADVERTISMENT>
        <TEXT>In denen Thurneysischen Buchlden allhier werden die ersten zwey Theile von folgendem Werck denen Herren Subseribenten ausgelffert:</TEXT>
        <BIBLIOGRAPHY>
            <ENTRY>
                <AUTHOR>Roberti Stephani</AUTHOR>
                <TITLE>Thesaurus Linguae Latinae post noviss. Londin. edit. insignitor auctam Annokationibus Honrici Stephani Locupletatus</TITLE>
                <EDITOR>Ant. Birrius</EDITOR>
                <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
            </ENTRY>
            <ENTRY>
                <TITLE>T. Lilius e. Integr. Sigonii & Gronovior Norit</TITLE>
                <VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME>
                <FORMAT>8.</FORMAT>
                <PAPER_TYPE>Schreib-Median-Pappier</PAPER_TYPE>
                <PRICE>
                    <AMOUNT>fl. 6.</AMOUNT>
                    <DURATION>kbanfftige Wochen</DURATION>
                </PRICE>
                <VALIDITY>
                    <DURATION>nur bis Ende Januarii</DURATION>
                    <YEAR>1740</YEAR>
                </VALIDITY>
                <PRICE_NOTE>nach welcher Zeit kein Eremplar unter <PRICE>7fl. 30. xr.</PRICE> verkaufft werden solle.</PRICE_NOTE>
            </ENTRY>
        </BIBLIOGRAPHY>
    </ADVERTISMENT>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1. Added XML declaration at the beginning.
2. Wrapped the content in a logical structure with <ADVERTISMENT> and <TEXT> tags for the introductory text.
3. Created a <BIBLIOGRAPHY> section to group bibliographic entries.
4. Split the original <BIBL> tag into multiple <ENTRY> tags for each bibliographic item.
5. Separated the second author into an <EDITOR> tag.
6. Added <PAPER_TYPE> tag for the paper description.
7. Structured the price information into a <PRICE> section with <AMOUNT> and <DURATION> tags.
8. Created a <VALIDITY> section to encapsulate the time-related information.
9. Added a <PRICE_NOTE> tag for the note about the price after the validity period.
10. Fixed and normalized special characters (e.g., , ffert, banfftige).
11. Ensured proper nesting and hierarchy of tags.
12. Added missing closing tags for all opened tags.
